r2dii.climate.stress.test 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Integration test

    Integration test

    integration-test.Rmd

    The goal of this article is to provide a developer-facing integration test. It shows that the package can be used in a user-mode, i.e. with this package installed in their system. This is by contrast with a developer-mode, which implies access to the package’s source code.

    library(purrr)
library(fs)
library(here)
#> here() starts at /home/mauro/git/r2dii.climate.stress.test

library(r2dii.climate.stress.test)
packageVersion("r2dii.climate.stress.test")
#> [1] '0.0.0.9000'

    Setup

    readLines(here(".Renviron"))
#> [1] "ST_PROJECT_FOLDER=/home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS"
#> [2] "ST_DATA_PATH=/home/mauro/tmp/ST_INPUTS_MASTER"     
#> [3] ""

    Empty outputs/

    outputs <- function() {
  dir_ls(path(Sys.getenv("ST_PROJECT_FOLDER"), "outputs"))
}

outputs()
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_comp.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_comp_el.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_port.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_sector_pd_changes_annual.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_sector_pd_changes_overall.csv
file_delete(outputs())

outputs()
#> character(0)

    Populate outputs/

    done <- quietly(run_stress_test_bonds)()
outputs()
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_comp.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_comp_el.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_port.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_sector_pd_changes_annual.csv
#> /home/mauro/tmp/ST_TESTING_BONDS/outputs/stress_test_results_bonds_sector_pd_changes_overall.csv

    Inspect the last object

    done
